com.tinkerpop.rexster.protocol

Class EngineController

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.tinkerpop.rexster.protocol.EngineController

  • public class EngineController
extends Object
    Manages the list of EngineHolder items for the current ScriptEngineManager. By default, the ScriptEngine instance is never reset.
    Author:
    Stephen Mallette (http://stephen.genoprime.com), Blake Eggleston (bdeggleston.github.com)

    • Method Detail

      • configure

        public static void configure(int resetCount,
             String initScriptFile)
        Must call this before a call to getInstance() if the reset count is to be taken into account. Defaults to the gremlin groovy script engine.

      • configure

        public static void configure(int resetCount,
             String initScriptFile,
             Set<String> configuredEngineNames)
        Must call this before a call to getInstance() if the reset count is to be taken into account.
        Parameters:
        configuredEngineNames - A list of script engine names that should be exposed.

      • configure

        public static void configure(int resetCount,
             String initScriptFile,
             Set<String> configuredEngineNames,
             Set<String> imports,
             Set<String> staticImports)
        Must call this before a call to getInstance() if the reset count is to be taken into account. ScriptEngine imports can be defined that are included in addition to the standard imports provided by Gremlin. These imports only get included for the GremlinGroovyScriptEngine at this time.
        Parameters:
        configuredEngineNames - A list of script engine names that should be exposed.
        imports - A list of imports for the script engine.
        staticImports - A list of static imports for the script engine.

      • configure

        public static void configure(List<EngineConfiguration> configurations)
